'''High Adeptal Energy Readings Ahead''' is an [[Achievement]] in the category ''[[A Realm Beyond: Series I]]''. To complete this achievement, the player needs to reach 20,000 Adeptal Energy in 2 [[Realm Layout|realm layouts]].
